item.title: By: Fi
item.dc:creator: Fi
item.description: <p>Gald you made it safely. As I am sitting at my desk eating shreddies out of a mug having been to the gym first thing I am extremely jealous of your ihop breakfast! Have a good one</p>
item.content:encoded: Gald you made it safely. As I am sitting at my desk eating shreddies out of a mug having been to the gym first thing I am extremely jealous of your ihop breakfast! Have a good one

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p>Glad you arrived safely - you knew the right week to be away as we have heavy snow forecast from later today onwards for the rest of the week!!!(Sitting on a balcony in the sun sounds good right now - can't get the flights for the break in Prague so looking at one for Madrid/Toledo/Salamanca. Hope ihop was good! Enjoy the rest of the week.</p>
item.content:encoded: Glad you arrived safely – you knew the right week to be away as we have heavy snow forecast from later today onwards for the rest of the week!!!(Sitting on a balcony in the sun sounds good right now – can’t get the flights for the break in Prague so looking at one for Madrid/Toledo/Salamanca. Hope ihop was good! Enjoy the rest of the week.
